titles.join-by-room-name-here: Enter a room name to quick join
titles.load-the-next-guest-in-queue: Load the next guest in queue
titles.share-a-website-as-an-embedded-iframe: Share a website as an embedded iFRAME
titles.alert-the-host-you-want-to-speak: Alert the host you want to speak
titles.you-can-also-enable-the-director-s-video: You can also enable the director`s Video Output afterwards by clicking the Setting`s button
titles.youtube-video-demoing-how-to-do-this: Youtube Video demoing how to do this
titles.invite-a-guest-or-camera-source-to-publi: Invite a guest or camera source to publish into the group room
titles.if-disabled-the-invited-guest-will-not-b: If disabled, the invited guest will not be able to see or hear anyone in the room.
titles.use-this-link-in-the-obs-browser-source-: Use this link as a Browser Source to capture the video or audio
titles.if-disabled-you-must-manually-add-a-vide: If disabled, you must manually add a video to a scene for it to appear.
titles.disables-echo-cancellation-and-improves-: Disables Echo Cancellation and improves audio quality
titles.audio-only-sources-are-visually-hidden-f: Audio-only sources are visually hidden from scenes
titles.allow-for-remote-stat-monitoring-via-the: Allow for remote stat monitoring via the monitoring tool
titles.the-guest-will-be-asked-if-they-want-to-: The guest will be asked if they want to reload the previous link when revisiting
titles.guest-will-be-prompted-to-enter-a-displa: Guest will be prompted to enter a Display Name
titles.display-names-will-be-shown-in-the-botto: Display Names will be shown in the bottom-left corner of videos
titles.guests-not-actively-speaking-will-be-hid: Guests not actively speaking will be hidden
titles.request-1080p60-from-the-guest-instead-o: Request 1080p60 from the Guest instead of 720p60, if possible
titles.the-default-microphone-will-be-pre-selec: The default microphone will be pre-selected for the guest
titles.the-default-camera-device-will-selected-: The default camera device will selected automatically
titles.the-guest-won-t-have-access-to-changing-: The guest won't have access to changing camera settings or screenshare
titles.the-guest-s-self-video-preview-will-appe: The guest's self-video preview will appear tiny in the top right
titles.allow-the-guests-to-pick-a-virtual-backs: Allow the guests to pick a virtual backscreen effect
titles.videos-use-an-animated-transition-when-b: Videos use an animated transition when being remixed
titles.increase-video-quality-that-guests-in-ro: Increase video quality that guests in room see.
titles.the-guest-will-not-see-their-own-self-pr: The guest will not see their own self-preview after joining
titles.guests-will-have-an-option-to-poke-the-d: Guests will have an option to poke the Director by pressing a button
titles.add-an-audio-compressor-to-the-guest-s-m: Add an audio compressor to the guest's microphone
titles.add-an-equalizer-to-the-guest-s-micropho: Add an Equalizer to the guest's microphone that the director can control
titles.show-some-prep-suggestions-to-the-guests: Show some prep suggestions to the guests on connect
titles.this-low-fi-video-codec-uses-very-little: This low-fi video codec uses very little CPU, even with dozens of active viewers.
titles.the-guest-can-only-see-the-director-s-vi: The guest can only see the Director's video, if provided
titles.the-guest-s-microphone-will-be-muted-on-: The guest's microphone will be muted on joining. They can unmute themselves.
titles.have-the-guest-join-muted-so-only-the-di: Have the guest join muted, so only the director can Unmute the guest.
titles.the-guest-will-not-be-asked-for-a-video-: The guest will not be asked for a video device on connection
titles.make-the-invite-url-encoded-so-parameter: Make the invite URL encoded, so parameters are harder to tinker with by guests
titles.the-active-speakers-are-made-visible-aut: The active speakers are made visible automatically
titles.set-the-background-color-to-bright-green: Set the background color to bright green
titles.add-a-10px-margin-around-all-video-eleme: Add a 10px margin around all video elements
titles.playback-the-video-with-mono-channel-aud: Playback the video with mono-channel audio
titles.have-the-videos-fit-their-respective-are: Have the videos fit their respective areas, even if it means cropping a bit
titles.have-videos-be-aligned-with-sizing-desig: Have videos be aligned with sizing designed for vertical video
titles.copy-this-stream-id-to-the-clipboard: Copy this Stream ID to the clipboard
titles.click-here-to-edit-the-label-for-this-st: Click here to edit the label for this stream. Changes will propagate to all viewers of this stream
titles.move-the-user-to-another-room-controlled: Move the user to another room, controlled by another director
titles.send-a-direct-message-to-this-user-: Send a Direct Message to this user.
titles.force-the-user-to-disconnect-they-can-al: Force the user to Disconnect. They can always reconnect.
titles.add-this-video-to-any-remote-scene-1-: Add this Video to any remote '&scene=1'
titles.add-this-video-to-any-remote-scene-2-: Add this Video to any remote '&scene=2'
titles.remotely-mute-this-audio-in-all-remote-s: Remotely Mute this Audio in all remote '&scene' views
titles.force-the-remote-sender-to-issue-a-keyfr: Force the remote sender to issue a keyframe to all scenes, fixing Pixel Smearing issues.
titles.request-the-statistics-of-this-video-in-: Request the statistics of this video in any active scene
titles.toggle-the-remote-guest-s-speaker-output: Toggle the remote guest's speaker output
titles.toggle-the-remote-guest-s-display-output: Toggle the remote guest's display output
titles.shift-this-video-down-in-order: Shift this Video Down in Order
titles.current-index-order-of-this-video: Current Index Order of this Video
titles.shift-this-video-up-in-order: Shift this Video Up in Order
titles.remotely-reload-the-guest-s-page-with-a-: Remotely reload the guest's page with a new URL
titles.start-recording-this-remote-stream-to-th: Start Recording this remote stream to this local drive. *experimental*'
titles.the-remote-guest-will-record-their-local: The Remote Guest will record their local stream to their local drive. *experimental*
titles.remotely-change-the-volume-of-this-guest: Remotely change the volume of this guest
titles.this-will-ask-the-remote-guest-for-permi: This will ask the remote guest for permission to change
titles.a-direct-solo-view-of-the-video-audio-st: A direct solo view of the video/audio stream with nothing else. Its audio can be remotely controlled from here
titles.this-guest-raised-their-hand-click-this-: This guest raised their hand. Click this to clear notification.
titles.activate-or-reload-this-video-device-: Activate or Reload this video device.
titles.tip-hold-ctrl-command-to-select-multiple: tip: Hold CTRL (command) to select Multiple
titles.improve-performance-and-quality-with-thi: Improve performance and quality with this tip
titles.increase-this-at-your-peril-changes-the-: Increase this at your peril. Changes the total inbound video bitrate per guest; mobile devices excluded. Webp-mode also excluded.
titles.for-large-group-rooms-this-option-can-re: For large group rooms, this option can reduce the load on remote guests substantially
titles.the-director-will-be-visible-in-scenes-a: The director will be visible in scenes, as if a performer themselves.
titles.useful-if-you-want-to-perform-and-direct: Useful if you want to perform and direct at the same time
titles.which-video-codec-would-you-want-used-by: Which video codec would you want used by default?
titles.you-ll-enter-as-the-room-s-director: You'll enter as the room's director
titles.ideal-for-1080p60-gaming-if-your-compute: Ideal for 1080p60 gaming, if your computer and upload are up for it
titles.better-video-compression-and-quality-at-: Better video compression and quality at the cost of increased CPU encoding load
titles.disable-digital-audio-effects-and-increa: Disable digital audio-effects and increase audio bitrate
titles.the-guest-will-not-have-a-choice-over-au: The guest will not have a choice over audio-options
titles.the-guest-will-only-be-able-to-select-th: The guest will only be able to select their webcam as an option
titles.hold-ctrl-and-the-mouse-wheel-to-zoom-in: Hold CTRL and the mouse wheel to zoom in and out remotely of compatible video streams
titles.encode-the-url-so-that-it-s-harder-for-a: Encode the URL so that it's harder for a guest to modify the settings.
titles.add-a-password-to-make-the-stream-inacce: Add a password to make the stream inaccessible to those without the password
titles.add-the-guest-to-a-group-chat-room-it-wi: Add the guest to a group-chat room; it will be created automatically if needed.
titles.customize-the-room-settings-for-this-gue: Customize the room settings for this guest
titles.hold-ctrl-or-cmd-to-select-multiple-file: Hold CTRL (or CMD) to select multiple files
titles.have-screen-shares-stream-id-s-use-a-pre: Have screen-shares stream ID's use a predictable prefixed value instead of a random one.
titles.toggle-solo-voice-chat-or-hold-ctrl-cmd-: Toggle solo voice chat or hold CTRL/CMD when selecting to make it two-way private.
titles.transfer-any-file-to-the-group: Transfer any file to the group
titles.the-camera-will-load-in-a-default-safe-m: The camera will load in a default safe-mode that may work if other modes fail.
titles.disable-animated-transitions-during-vide: Disable animated transitions during video mixing
titles.allow-the-guest-to-select-a-file-to-uplo: Allow the guest to select a file to upload to the director. Once shared, it will show in the chat as a download link.
titles.set-a-countdown-timer-that-this-guest-se: Set a countdown timer that this guest sees
titles.will-remember-the-room-prompting-you-the: Will remember the room, prompting you the next time you visit if you wish to load this director's room again
titles.share-a-website-with-your-guests-iframe-: Share a website with your guests (IFRAME)
titles.hold-ctrl-or-cmd-and-click-to-spotlight-: Hold CTRL (or CMD) and click to spotlight this video
titles.if-checked-the-director-can-be-added-to-: If checked, the director can be added to scenes as if a guest. Otherwise, the director will never appear in a scene.
titles.adjust-the-amount-of-effect-applied: Adjust the amount of effect applied
titles.the-guest-will-be-able-to-select-digital: The guest will be able to select digital video effects to apply.
titles.use-this-link-as-a-browser-source-to-cap: Use this link as a Browser Source to capture the video or audio
titles.show-a-custom-welcome-message-to-the-joi: Show a custom welcome message to the joining guest of this invite link
titles.the-solo-view-link-of-the-director-s-vid: The solo view link of the Director's video.
titles.only-the-director-s-video-will-be-visibl: Only the director's video will be visible to guests and within group scenes
titles.right-click-this-video-for-additional-op: Right-click this video for additional options
titles.make-the-invite-url-encoded-so-parameter: Make the invite URL encoded, so parameters are harder to tinker with by guests. This also debrands the interface and gives it a new domain name.
titles.set-a-countdown-timer-that-this-guest-se: Set a countdown timer that this guest sees. CTRL (cmd) + click to pause.
titles.video-packet-loss-indicator-of-video-pre: Video packet loss indicator of video preview; green is good, red is bad. Flame implies CPU is overloaded. May not reflect the packet loss seen by scenes or other guests.
titles.hold-ctrl-or-cmd-while-clicking-the-vide: Hold CTRL or CMD (⌘) while clicking the video to open detailed stats
titles.for-more-known-issues-click-here: For more known issues, click here
titles.hold-ctrl-or-cmd-to-lock-width-and-heigh: Hold CTRL (or cmd) to lock width and height together when changing them
titles.obs-remote-controller-start-stop-and-cha: OBS Remote Controller; start/stop and change scenes.
titles.link-out-to-the-vdo-ninja-help-guide-for: link out to the help guide
titles.this-mode-encodes-the-video-and-audio-in: This mode encodes the video and audio into chunks, which are shared with multiple viewers. Limited browser support. Can potentially reduce CPU and improve video quality, but will rely on a buffer.
titles.allow-the-guest-to-select-an-avatar-imag: Allow the guest to select an avatar image for when they hide their camera
titles.use-meshcast-servers-to-restream-video-d: Use Meshcast servers to restream video data from this guest to its viewers, reducing the CPU and upload load in some cases. Will increase latency a bit.
titles.show-an-ovelaid-grid-on-the-guest-s-prev: Show an ovelaid grid on the guest's preview video to help with self-centering of the guest.
titles.disable-fit-to-window-optmized-video-sca: Disable fit-to-window optmized video scaling for added sharpness; increases CPU / Network load though.
titles.remotely-change-the-volume-of-this-guest: Remotely change the volume of this guest; updates on release. Dbl-click to reset.
titles.choose-a-hotkey-for-hold-to-talk-if-usin: Choose a hotkey for Hold-to-Talk. If using Electron Capture, elevate privilleges to have it become global
titles.increase-this-at-your-peril-changes-the-: Increase this at your peril. Changes the total inbound video bitrate per guest; mobile devices excluded.
titles.select-a-location-that-is-closest-to-bot: Select a location that is closest to both you and your audience.

innerHTML.copy-this-url: Copy this URL into your "browser source"
innerHTML.push-to-talk-enable:
enable director`s microphone or video
(only guests can see this feed)
innerHTML.click-for-quick-room-overview: Click Here for a quick overview and help
innerHTML.click-here-for-help: Click Here for a quick overview and help
innerHTML.welcome-to-control-room:
Welcome. This is the director's control-room for the group-chat.

You can host a group chat with friends using a room. Share the blue link to invite guests who will join the chat automatically.

A group room can handle normally around 6 to 20 guests, depending on numerous factors, including CPU and available bandwidth of all guests in the room
innerHTML.invite-users-to-join: Guests can use the link to join the group room
innerHTML.this-is-obs-browser-source-link: Use studio software to capture the group video mix
innerHTML.powerful-computers-only: Only use with powerful computers and small groups!!
innerHTML.this-can-reduce-packet-loss: Can reduce packet loss video corruption
innerHTML.learn-more-about-params: Learn more about URL parameters at
innerHTML.only-director-can-hear-you: Only the director can hear you currently.
innerHTML.rooms-allow-for: Rooms allow for group-chat and the tools to manage multiple guests.
innerHTML.guests-only-see-director: Guests can only see the Director's Video
innerHTML.scenes-can-see-director: Director will also be a performer
innerHTML.added-notes:
Important Tips:
  • Disabling video sharing between guests will improve performance
  • Invite only guests to the room that you trust.
  • The "Recording" option is considered experimental.
innerHTML.use-chrome-instead:
Consider using a Chromium-based browser instead.
Safari is more prone to having audio issues
innerHTML.here-you-can-pre-generate: Here you can pre-generate a reusable Browser Source link and a related guest invite link.
innerHTML.enable-stereo-and-pro: Enable Stereo and Pro HD Audio
innerHTML.add-the-guest-to-a-room: Add the guest to a room:
innerHTML.can-see-and-hear: Can see and hear the group chat
innerHTML.can-hear-only: Can only hear the group chat
innerHTML.cant-see-or-hear: Cannot hear or see the group chat
innerHTML.select-the-video-files-to-share: SELECT THE VIDEO FILES TO SHARE
innerHTML.enter-the-website-URL-you-wish-to-share: Enter the URL website you wish to share.
innerHTML.more-than-four-can-join: These four guest slots are just for demonstration. More than four guests can actually join a room.
innerHTML.welcome-to-vdo-ninja-chat: Welcome! You can send text messages directly to connected peers from here.
innerHTML.privacy-disabled: Privacy warning: The director will be able to remotely change which camera and microphone is being used while this page is open, if you continue.
innerHTML.allow-effects-invite: Allow video effects to be used
innerHTML.please-select-option-to-join: Please select an option to join.
innerHTML.highlight-director-only-video-guests-wil: Highlight Director (only video guests will see)
innerHTML.allow-co-directors-to-change-a-guests-ur: Allow co-directors to change a guest's URL
innerHTML.looking-to-just-chat-and-not-direct: Looking to just chat and not direct?
innerHTML.for-the-best-possible-experience-make-su: For the best possible experience, make sure
innerHTML.your-connection-is-hardwired-instead-of-: Your connection is hardwired instead of wifi

placeholders.enter-chat-message-to-send-here: Enter chat message to send here

miscellaneous.new-display-name: Enter a new Display Name for this stream
miscellaneous.submit-error-report: Press OK to submit any error logs. Error logs may contain private information.
miscellaneous.director-redirect-1: The director wishes to redirect you to the URL:
miscellaneous.audio-processing-disabled: Audio processing is disabled with this guest. Can't mute or change volume
miscellaneous.not-the-director: <font color='red'>You are not the director of this room. You will have limited to no control.</font>
miscellaneous.room-is-claimed:
The room is already claimed by someone else.

Only the first person to join a room is the assigned director.

Refresh after the first director leaves to claim.
miscellaneous.room-is-claimed-codirector:
The room is already claimed by someone else.

Trying to join as a co-director...
miscellaneous.streamid-already-published:
The stream ID you are publishing to is already in use.

Please try with a different invite link or refresh to retry again.

You will now be disconnected.
miscellaneous.room-test-not-good:
The room name 'test' is very commonly used and may not be secure.

Are you sure you wish to proceed?
miscellaneous.load-previous-session: Would you like to load your previous session's settings?
miscellaneous.enter-password:
Please enter the password below: 

(Note: Passwords are case-sensitive and you will not be alerted if it is incorrect.)
miscellaneous.enter-password-2:
Please enter the password below: 

(Note: Passwords are case-sensitive.)
miscellaneous.enter-director-password:
Please enter the director's password:

(Note: Passwords are case-sensitive and you will not be alerted if it is incorrect.)
miscellaneous.password-incorrect:
The password was incorrect.

Refresh and try again.
miscellaneous.enter-new-display-name: Enter a new Display Name for this stream
miscellaneous.what-bitrate:
What bitrate would you like to record at? (kbps)
(note: This feature is experimental, so have backup recordings going)
miscellaneous.enter-website: Enter a website URL to share
miscellaneous.press-ok-to-record:
Press OK to start recording. Press again to stop and download.

Warning: Keep this browser tab active to continue recording.

You can change the default video bitrate if desired below (kbps)
miscellaneous.no-streamID-provided:
No streamID was provided; one will be generated randomily.

Stream ID:
miscellaneous.alphanumeric-only:
Info: Only AlphaNumeric characters should be used for the stream ID.

The offending characters have been replaced by an underscore
miscellaneous.stream-id-too-long:
The Stream ID should be less than 45 alPhaNuMeric characters long.

We will trim it to length.
miscellaneous.share-with-trusted: Share only with those you trust
miscellaneous.transfer-guest-to-room:
Transfer guests to room:

(Please note rooms must share the same password)
miscellaneous.transfer-guest-to-url:
Transfer guests to new website URL.

(Guests will be prompted to accept)
miscellaneous.confirm-disconnect-users: Are you sure you wish to disconnect these users?
miscellaneous.confirm-disconnect-user: Are you sure you wish to disconnect this user?
miscellaneous.enter-new-codirector-password: Enter a co-director password to use
miscellaneous.signal-meter: Video packet loss indicator of video preview; green is good, red is bad. Flame implies CPU is overloaded. May not reflect the packet loss seen by scenes or other guests.
miscellaneous.waiting-for-the-stream: Waiting for the stream. Tip: Adding &cleanoutput to the URL will hide this spinner, or click to retry, which will also hide it.
miscellaneous.you-have-been-transferred: You've been transferred to a different room
miscellaneous.you-are-no-longer-a-co-director: You are no longer a co-director as you were transferred.
miscellaneous.headphones-tip: Tip: Use headphones to avoid audio echo issues.
miscellaneous.camera-tip-c922: Tip: To achieve 60-fps with a C922 webcam, low-light compensation needs to be turned off, exposure set to auto, and 720p used.
miscellaneous.camera-tip-camlink: Tip: A Cam Link may glitch green/purple if accessed elsewhere while already in use.
miscellaneous.samsung-a-series: Samsung A-series phones may have issues with Chrome; if so, try Firefox Mobile instead or switch video codecs.
miscellaneous.screen-permissions-denied:
Permission to capture denied. Ensure your browser has screen record system permissions

1.On your Mac, choose Apple menu  > System Preferences, click Security & Privacy , then click Privacy.
2.Select Screen Recording.
3.Select the checkbox next to your browser to allow it to record your screen.
miscellaneous.change-audio-output-device:
Audio could not be captured. Please make sure you have an audio output device available.

Some gaming headsets (ie: Corsair) may need to be set to 2-channel output to work, as surround sound drivers may cause problems.
miscellaneous.prompt-access-request: is trying to view your stream. Allow them?
miscellaneous.confirm-reload-user: Are you sure you wish to reload this user's browser?
miscellaneous.webrtc-is-blocked:
⚠ This browser has either blocked WebRTC or does not support it.

This site will not work without it.

Disable any browser extensions or privacy settings that may be blocking WebRTC, or try a different browser.
miscellaneous.not-clean-session:
Video effects or canvas rendering failed.

Check to ensure any remotely hosted images are cross-origin allowed.
miscellaneous.ios-no-screen-share: Sorry, but your iOS browser does not support screen-sharing.
miscellaneous.android-no-screen-share: Sorry, your mobile browser does not support screen-sharing.
miscellaneous.no-screen-share-supported:
Sorry, your browser does not support screen-sharing.

Please use the desktop versions of Firefox or Chrome instead.
miscellaneous.speech-not-suppoted: ⚠ Speech Recognition is not supported by this browser
miscellaneous.blue-yeti-tip: Tip: Blue Yeti microphones may experience issues being overly loud. Please see here for a solution or disable auto-gain.
miscellaneous.site-not-responsive:
Notice: The system cannot be accessed or is currently slow to respond.

Contact steve@seguin.email for added help. This service requires the use of Websockets over port 443.
miscellaneous.no-audio-source-detected: Notice: No Audio Source was detected
